in this post, i'm expressing my concern about the amount of personal information that is being collected and stored by companies and governments. i'm also highlighting the importance of data privacy as a human right and encouraging people to take back control of their personal data. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphÃ¤re (privacy), and #menschenrecht (human rights) are used to reach a wider audience and connect with others who share the same concerns.
